<template>

  <v-card class="stickyTabBar">
          <v-container>
              <v-tabs  background-color="white" left dark>
                  <v-tabs-slider color="#1f4643"></v-tabs-slider>
                  <v-tab class="black--text text-h6" @click="handleScroll('overview')">
                      OVERVIEW
                  </v-tab>
                  <v-tab class="black--text text-h6" @click="handleScroll('PHOTOGALARY')">
                      PHOTO GALARY
                  </v-tab>
                  <v-tab class="black--text text-h6" @click="handleScroll('NEARBY')">
                      NEARBY
                  </v-tab>
              </v-tabs>
          </v-container>
      </v-card>

</template>

<script>
export default {
  name:'tabBar',
  methods: {
      handleScroll(id) {
          this.$vuetify.goTo("#" + id, { offset: 50 });
      }
  }
}

</script>

<style scoped>
.stickyTabBar {
  position: sticky;
  top: 60px;
  z-index: 2;
}

</style>
